Package com.pump.image.pixel.quantize

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BiasedMedianCutColorQuantization
    This is a modified MedianCutColorQuantization.
    ColorLUT
    This is a tool to help reduce the time it takes to map an arbitrary color to its closest match(es) in limited color set.
    ColorLUT.ColorNode  
    ColorLUT.Match
    A response to a query for approximate matches.
    ColorQuantization
    This is an algorithm that converts a large ColorSet to a smaller one.
    ColorSet
    This class stores information about the frequency of colors.
    ColorSet.FrequencyComparator
    Sort RGB values in order of frequency.
    ColorSet.RGBChannelComparator
    Sorts RGB values in order of increasing red, green or blue masks.
    ErrorDiffusionImageQuantization
    This applies error diffusion to an image.
    ImageQuantization
    This is an algorithm that converts an image with thousands or millions of colors into a simpler image with a fixed color palette.
    ImageQuantization.AbstractIndexedBytePixelIterator  
    MedianCutColorQuantization
    This is a median cut color reduction algorithm.
    NearestNeighborImageQuantization
    This implements image quantization using a nearest-neighbor approach.
    NearestNeighborImageQuantization.NearestNeighborIndexedBytePixelIterator
    The pixel iterator that implements the nearest neighbor image quantization.
